overview_of_class:
This course will explore techniques to analyze unstructured text such as that found in emails, text messages, conversation transcripts, web pages, books, scientific journals, etc. The course strives to offer a
balance between breadth and depth, presenting both an overview of the field as well as some insight into the mathematical underpinning of a few representative techniques.
name: Seminar in Linguistics
title: WCAS LING 400-0-20 Seminar in Linguistics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
This course will explore techniques to analyze unstructured text such as that found in emails, text messages, conversation transcripts, web pages, books, scientific journals, etc. The course strives to offer a
balance between breadth and depth, presenting both an overview of the field as well as some insight into the mathematical underpinning of a few representative techniques.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
Understand the range of tools available for analyzing language data, as found in emails, text messages, conversation transcripts, web pages, books, scientific journals, and even speech recordings; learn
to build and implement many examples of natural language models

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Participation in class, homework assignments including programming and short-answer exercises

subject: LING
